evidence_example.title: Demo QP for DPs problem
evidence_example.small_descr: This demo implements the Dining Philosophers Problem (DPP) example.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Demo that shows how to use the QP framework. This demo implements the Dining Philosophers Problem (DPP) example using six concurrent active objects. The behavior of each object is implemented through a state machine.
  • LED6 (BLUE) is on when a Philosopher is eating. It is off otherwise;
  • LED5 (RED) is on when the application is paused.
  • User Button is used to pause and resume the application
Hardware:
  • STM32F407 Discovery board.
